data.description: I work on improving and maintaining a trading web platform, with the goal of replicating a complex desktop application in the browser using Vue 3. My daily tasks include making tactical decisions regarding project launches, coding solutions, analyzing the impacts on the rest of the application, reviewing my colleagues' code and, of course, fixing bugs.

At Ábaco, I worked with a low-code software called GeneXus to develop Public Sector Accounting software. This was my first experience as a software developer, where I learned how to collaborate with other developers using Git and participated in daily meetings. I began my journey as an intern and received a promotion to Trainee Developer within three months, eventually advancing to the position of Junior Developer.
